verses.text: \w Later|strong="G3326"\w*, \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w Tiberias|strong="G5085"\w*,\f + \fr 21:1 \ft That is, the Sea of Galilee\f* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w revealed|strong="G5319"\w* \w Himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*. \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w made|strong="G5319"\w* \w Himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w known|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w way|strong="G3779"\w*:

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* landed, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* saw \w a|strong="G5613"\w* charcoal fire \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w fish|strong="G3795"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* bread.

Jesus and Peter

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* finished eating, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, “\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* son \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w do|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w love|strong="G5368"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w*?” “\w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*,” \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w love|strong="G5368"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w*.” \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Feed|strong="G1006"\w* \w My|strong="G1473"\w* lambs.”

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* rumor \w spread|strong="G1831"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* brothers \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* die. \w However|strong="G1161"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* die, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w only|strong="G3756"\w*, “\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w remain|strong="G3306"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* return, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*?”

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w testifies|strong="G3140"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w has|strong="G3778"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w down|strong="G1125"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3754"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w*.
